name: Time Wanderer
description:
Time Wanderer is a breathtaking 3D action RPG filled  with puzzles, dynamic combats and lots of exploration, all within the  realm of an emotional science fiction story.

Players take on the role of Corina, a girl who gets “lost” in  time and wander throughout different historical moments of humanity as  she searches for a way back to her own timeline to fulfil her mission,  while avoiding making irreversible changes in mankind's story in the  process.

You can help us in Kickstarter leaving a feedback - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1927802367/time-wanderer
